title: #265: One Nation Under Blackmail | Whitney Webb
description:
Whitney Webb is back again to discuss her two-volume book series on intelligence agencies, international crime syndicates, dirty banks, and the players behind the networks.

From BCCI to Iran-Contra, to the Savings & Loans fiasco, the events of the 1980s and 1990s seem long forgotten and perhaps unconnected to the blackmail operations run by Jeffrey Epstein and his associates, but as we have come to understand: everything is connected.

With over a thousand footnotes and almost as many pages, this book series is best described as an “encyclopedia of criminality” and a reference material must for anyone serious about understanding the intersection of crime and government.
